idea-plugin.name: ObjectiveSql
idea-plugin.description:
Filling the generated elements for ObjectSql. Discuss, review, and share code with your team in your JetBrains. The compile error of auto-generated code will be suppressed, and it implements code completion with PsiAugmentProvider in the IntelliJ

Supported annotations of ObjectiveSql:

  • @DomainModel
  • @Column
  • @PrimaryKey
  • @Queryable
  • @Transactional
  • @Relation
  • @Transient

See more: ObjectiveSql
